ModMetaData.name: Helixien Gas Boiler
ModMetaData.author: CiXwOw
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a boiler for Dubs Bad Hygiene that uses Helixien Gas from Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power. Now also supports Dubs Central Heating! Can be used with Bad Hygiene, Central Heating, or BOTH!
Also patches name of the existing gas boiler from DBH to chemfuel boiler.
